short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For More Trust in the Blockchain Space. Easily Verify Crypto Addresses with One Click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With ONIFY, you can easily identify blockchain wallets and smart contracts that are verified with ONINO and confirm their authenticity in seconds. Simply add the blockchain address you are interacting with to the search box and see detailed information if it is verified by ONINO, or warnings if the address has been reported as fraudulent. 

ONINO AutoDetection automatically detects known blockchain addresses on websites and instantly tells you if an address is trusted or fraudulent without you having to open the extension.

Never worry about fraud again. Finally, more peace of mind when navigating the blockchain space.
